attributes.action: use his influence and that of his Chancellor to promote the use of Isambard Kingdom Brunel on the reverse of any future redesigned British Banknote
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is noted the Bank of England are currently undergoing the launch of new design British Banknotes with the Adam Smith £20 the first in this series.

The undersigned petition the Prime Minister to use his influence and that of the Chancellor of the Exchequer to suggest to the Bank of England the "engineer of the backbone of Britain" Isambard Kingdom Brunel is considered for the redesign of any future note. 

It is noted Brunel has been routinely voted and chosen as a national icon in line with many of those already chosen for tribute on the reverse of British currency.
